fields.notes: If a unit is hit by Avalanche then Tossed, it can be hit a second time by Avalanche if it lands in the area of effect before Avalanche ends. You can toss allies, but they don't take damage. Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.

fields.lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.
fields.description: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.
fields.name: Avalanche
fields.notes: Deals damage over a 1 second duration.

fields.lore: Melee warriors tend to find attacking the Stone Giant largely ineffective.
fields.description: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers.  Enemies that attack Tiny from within 300 units have a chance of being stunned.
fields.name: Craggy Exterior
fields.notes: The damage and stun occur at the start of an attack.

fields.lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.
fields.description:
Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Grow
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity.

fields.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation. The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
fields.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.
fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.notes: This spell interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
fields.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.
fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.notes: This spell interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
fields.description: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.
fields.name: Track
fields.notes: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died. Gives True Sight as well as shared vision of the target. Track's effect is only visible to allies. The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold. Bonus gold is reliable gold.

fields.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
fields.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
fields.name: Static Remnant
fields.notes: Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast. Remnants grant flying vision for their duration. The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.

fields.lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
fields.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
fields.name: Overload
fields.notes: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.

fields.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
fields.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Electric Vortex

fields.lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
fields.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
fields.name: Overload
fields.notes: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.

fields.lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
fields.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
fields.name: Overload
fields.notes: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.

fields.lore: The Storm is coming in.
fields.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The mana activation cost is 15+7% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+1% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
fields.name: Ball Lightning
fields.notes: Instant cast abilities can be used while traveling. This ability will destroy trees. Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to blend with all spectrums of light.
fields.description: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.
fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.name: Doppelwalk

fields.lore: Azwraith accepts his fate, embracing his infinite army of phantoms.
fields.description: Phantom Lancer hones his abilities.  Improves chance of Juxtaposing, and the Juxtapose illusions can now create their own illusions.  Phantom Edge also increases Phantom Lancer's magic resistance.
fields.name: Phantom Edge
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Azwraith accepts his fate, embracing his infinite army of phantoms.

fields.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
fields.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
fields.name: Rot
fields.notes: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling. Rot hits invisible units. If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated. Pudge can deny himself with this ability.

fields.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
fields.description: Launches a bloody hook at a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
fields.name: Meat Hook
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy. Meat Hook hits invisible units. Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units. Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.

fields.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dismember
fields.notes: Dismember will disable magic immune units, but not damage them. If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.

fields.lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
fields.description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
fields.name: Flesh Heap
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
fields.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
fields.name: Telekinesis
fields.notes: While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction. When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun. The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.

fields.lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
fields.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.
fields.name: Fade Bolt

fields.lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
fields.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.

fields.lore: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.
fields.description:
Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Spell Steal
fields.notes: Cannot steal item abilities.

fields.name: Fade Bolt

fields.lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
fields.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects his allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.
fields.name: Null Field
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
fields.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects his allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.
fields.name: Null Field
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
fields.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects his allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.
fields.name: Null Field
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation. The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
fields.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.
fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.notes: This spell interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
fields.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.
fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.notes: This spell interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
fields.description: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.
fields.name: Track
fields.notes: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died. Gives True Sight as well as shared vision of the target. Track's effect is only visible to allies. The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold. Bonus gold is reliable gold.

fields.lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
fields.description: Shadow Wave heals several allies, which in turn cause damage equal to their healing in a small area around them.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave, and it does not count toward the number of targets.
fields.name: Shadow Wave
fields.notes: Prioritizes allied heroes over creeps. If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they can take multiple instances of damage.

fields.lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
fields.description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.
fields.name: Shallow Grave
fields.notes: HP cannot go below 1 while under the effects of Shallow Grave, but Axe's Culling Blade will still kill the hero.

fields.lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
fields.description: Shadow Wave heals several allies, which in turn cause damage equal to their healing in a small area around them.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave, and it does not count toward the number of targets.
fields.name: Shadow Wave
fields.notes: Prioritizes allied heroes over creeps. If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they can take multiple instances of damage.

fields.lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
fields.description:
Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, causing damage and slowness over time, and eventual paralysis.  Poison Touch mini-stuns on impact. Slow increases per level.

Level 1 slows the target by 33% during the set time.

Level 2 slows the target by 33% for 2 seconds, then by 66% for 1 second.

Level 3 slows the target by 33%, 66%, and 100%, for one second respectively.

Level 4 slows the target by 33%, then slows the target by 66% for 1 second, then stuns the target for 1 second.
fields.name: Poison Touch
fields.notes: The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities. The initial ministun will cancel channeling.

fields.lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
fields.description: Shadow Wave heals several allies, which in turn cause damage equal to their healing in a small area around them.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave, and it does not count toward the number of targets.
fields.name: Shadow Wave
fields.notes: Prioritizes allied heroes over creeps. If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they can take multiple instances of damage.

fields.lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
fields.description:
Applies a buff that increases allied hero armor or decreases enemy hero armor in the target area over time.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Weave
fields.notes: Places a buff on units, so entering or leaving the area after the cast has no effect.

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.
fields.name: Fissure

fields.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
fields.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
fields.name: Aftershock
fields.notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.
fields.name: Fissure

fields.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
fields.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.
fields.name: Enchant Totem
fields.notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.

fields.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fields.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.

fields.name: Aftershock
fields.notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

fields.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
fields.description:
Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Echo Slam
fields.notes: Will not damage ethereal units. The initial damage will go through magic immunity; the additional damage will not. Units creating echoes also take damage from the wave they produced.

fields.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Earth Spike
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

fields.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.notes: Destroys illusions after 0.25 seconds.

fields.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.notes: Destroys illusions after 0.25 seconds.

fields.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
fields.name: Hex
fields.notes: Instantly destroys illusions. The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled. Hex disables damage block and evasion.

fields.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.notes: Destroys illusions after 0.25 seconds.

fields.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
fields.description:
Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Finger of Death
fields.notes: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
fields.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
fields.name: Dragon Blood

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
fields.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
fields.name: Dragon Tail

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
fields.description:
Dragon Knight can take the form of three powerful elder dragons.
LEVEL 1 - Green Dragon: Short poison damage over time on attack.
LEVEL 2 - Red Dragon: Splash damage on attack.
LEVEL 3 - Blue Dragon: Splash damage and frost attack that slows enemy units.
fields.name: Elder Dragon Form
fields.notes: Level 1 Dragon's Corrosive Breath deals 20 damage per second and lasts 5 seconds, and works on structures. Level 2 Dragon's Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% in a 100/200/250 radius, and has level 1's Corrosive Breath. Level 3 Dragon's Frost Breath slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20%, lasting 3 seconds.

fields.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
fields.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
fields.name: Morph (Agility Gain)
fields.notes: Morph works while Morphling is disabled, but not when silenced. Morph can't convert stats from items.

fields.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
fields.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
fields.name: Waveform

fields.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
fields.name: Waveform

fields.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
fields.name: Morph (Agility Gain)
fields.notes: Morph works while Morphling is disabled, but not when silenced. Morph can't convert stats from items.

fields.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
fields.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
fields.name: Waveform

fields.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
fields.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
fields.name: Morph (Agility Gain)
fields.notes: Morph works while Morphling is disabled, but not when silenced. Morph can't convert stats from items.

fields.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
fields.description: Strikes an enemy unit with a blast of water. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, it deals the maximum damage and the minimum stun. If strength is 50% higher, it deals the maximum stun and minimum damage.
fields.name: Adaptive Strike
fields.notes: Knocks the target back 100 - 300 units.

fields.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
fields.description: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, although only dealing 50% the original hero's damage.  At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate.
fields.name: Replicate
fields.notes: You can't target yourself with Replicate.

fields.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
fields.description: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, although only dealing 50% the original hero's damage.  At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate.
fields.name: Replicate
fields.notes: You can't target yourself with Replicate.

fields.notes: Knocks the target back 100 - 300 units.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
fields.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
fields.name: Rot
fields.notes: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling. Rot hits invisible units. If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated. Pudge can deny himself with this ability.

fields.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
fields.description: Launches a bloody hook at a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
fields.name: Meat Hook
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy. Meat Hook hits invisible units. Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units. Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.

fields.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.

fields.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dismember
fields.notes: Dismember will disable magic immune units, but not damage them. If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.

fields.name: Meat Hook
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy. Meat Hook hits invisible units. Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units. Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.

fields.name: Rot

fields.lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
fields.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
fields.name: Timber Chain

fields.lore: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.
fields.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.
fields.name: Whirling Death

fields.lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
fields.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
fields.name: Timber Chain

fields.lore: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.
fields.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.
fields.name: Whirling Death

fields.lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
fields.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
fields.name: Timber Chain

fields.lore: The ultimate in anti-flora weaponry.
fields.description: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
fields.name: Chakram
fields.notes: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away.

fields.lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
fields.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
fields.name: Timber Chain

fields.lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
fields.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy Heroes to take damage and lose mana until they cast a spell.
fields.name: Curse of the Silent

fields.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
fields.description: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.
fields.name: Last Word
fields.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.

fields.lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
fields.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy Heroes to take damage and lose mana until they cast a spell.
fields.name: Curse of the Silent

fields.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
fields.description: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.
fields.name: Last Word
fields.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.

fields.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
fields.description: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.
fields.name: Last Word
fields.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this affect once the caster finishes its channel.

fields.lore: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
fields.description:
Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Global Silence
fields.notes: This skill works on invisible and magic immune units, but gaining magic immunity will remove its effect.

fields.description: Skywrath launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath's intelligence.
fields.name: Arcane Bolt
fields.notes: The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds. Arcane Bolt cannot be disjointed.

fields.description: Skywrath sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
fields.name: Concussive Shot
fields.notes: Does not work when no heroes are in range or heroes are in fog. Damages creeps around the impact area. Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact. Concussive Shot cannot be disjointed.

fields.description: Skywrath seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
fields.name: Ancient Seal
fields.notes: The magic resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.

fields.description: Skywrath launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath's intelligence.
fields.name: Arcane Bolt
fields.notes: The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds. Arcane Bolt cannot be disjointed.

fields.description: Skywrath launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath's intelligence.
fields.name: Arcane Bolt
fields.notes: The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds. Arcane Bolt cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four..
fields.description: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.
fields.name: Juxtapose

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: Azwraith accepts his fate, embracing his infinite army of phantoms.
fields.description: Phantom Lancer hones his abilities.  Improves chance of Juxtaposing, and the Juxtapose illusions can now create their own illusions.  Phantom Edge also increases Phantom Lancer's magic resistance.
fields.name: Phantom Edge
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
fields.description: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.
fields.name: Spirit Lance
fields.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
fields.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
fields.name: Phase Shift
fields.notes: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift. Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift. Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
fields.description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
fields.name: Waning Rift

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
fields.description:
Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for .5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, deals damage again and stuns.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dream Coil

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.
fields.description: Banishes the targeted unit, removing it from play for the duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.
fields.name: Disruption

fields.lore: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
fields.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
fields.name: Shadow Poison
fields.notes: Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.

fields.lore: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.
fields.description: Banishes the targeted unit, removing it from play for the duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.
fields.name: Disruption

fields.lore: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
fields.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
fields.name: Shadow Poison
fields.notes: Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
fields.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
fields.name: Teleportation
fields.notes: Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast. Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting. When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
fields.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
fields.name: Teleportation
fields.notes: Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast. Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting. When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
fields.description:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Wrath of Nature
fields.notes: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision. Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.

fields.lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
fields.description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
fields.name: Split Earth
fields.notes: Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect. There is a 0.35 second delay before the effect is applied.

fields.lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.
fields.description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal mixed damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Lasts 8 seconds.
fields.name: Diabolic Edict
fields.notes: Damage is not reduced by damage block. The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed. Can damage buildings, magic immune units, and invisible units.

fields.lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.
fields.description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal mixed damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Lasts 8 seconds.
fields.name: Diabolic Edict
fields.notes: Damage is not reduced by damage block. The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed. Can damage buildings, magic immune units, and invisible units.

fields.lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
fields.description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
fields.name: Split Earth
fields.notes: Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect. There is a 0.35 second delay before the effect is applied.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
fields.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
fields.name: Phase Shift
fields.notes: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift. Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift. Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
fields.description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
fields.name: Waning Rift

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
fields.description:
Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for .5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, deals damage again and stuns.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dream Coil

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
fields.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
fields.name: Waveform

fields.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
fields.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
fields.name: Morph (Agility Gain)
fields.notes: Morph works while Morphling is disabled, but not when silenced. Morph can't convert stats from items.

fields.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
fields.description: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, although only dealing 50% the original hero's damage.  At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate.
fields.name: Replicate
fields.notes: You can't target yourself with Replicate.

fields.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
fields.description: Strikes an enemy unit with a blast of water. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, it deals the maximum damage and the minimum stun. If strength is 50% higher, it deals the maximum stun and minimum damage.
fields.name: Adaptive Strike
fields.notes: Knocks the target back 100 - 300 units.

fields.lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
fields.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
fields.name: Slithereen Crush

fields.lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
fields.description: Slardar moves significantly faster, but takes bonus damage.
fields.name: Sprint
fields.notes: Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities. The damage amplification from Mask of Madness doesn't stack with Sprint.

fields.lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
fields.description: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.
fields.name: Bash
fields.notes: Stun works on magic immune units. Does not stack with Skull Basher.

fields.lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
fields.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
fields.name: Slithereen Crush

fields.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
fields.name: Slithereen Crush

fields.lore: Slardar's lure-light reveals even the most hidden of opponents, as well as their vulnerabilities.
fields.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.
fields.name: Amplify Damage
fields.notes: Gives True Sight and shared vision of the target. Works on magic immune units.

fields.lore: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
fields.description:
Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 8 seconds.

Burning Spears is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Burning Spear
fields.notes: Burning Spears stacks additively when used multiple times on one target.  There is no cap. Huskar cannot kill himself with this skill.

fields.lore: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.
fields.description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic resistance based on missing health.
fields.name: Berserker's Blood
fields.notes: Maximum bonus (14 stacks) is achieved when Huskar has strictly less than 3% of his maximum HP.

fields.lore: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
fields.description:

fields.description:

Burning Spears is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

fields.notes: Burning Spears stacks additively when used multiple times on one target.  There is no cap. Huskar cannot kill himself with this skill.

fields.lore: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.
fields.description:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to inflict a percentage of that hero's current HP, and slow at the cost of his own vitality.  While leaping, Huskar is magic immune.  Slow lasts 5 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Life Break
fields.notes: If Huskar is disabled during the charge or the target moves more than 1400 units in 0.015 seconds, the charge stops. Slow works on magic immune units. Life Break cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: While Huskar has little use for magic, this minor enchantment was learned from the Dazzle and the Dezun priests, to be used in times of great injury.
fields.description: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 40% it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.
fields.name: Inner Vitality
fields.notes: The HP percentage is checked every second and the regeneration adjusted accordingly. Can be cast on magic immune units.

fields.lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
fields.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units he comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to his original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
fields.name: Icarus Dive
fields.notes: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

fields.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
fields.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around you. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
fields.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around you. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.lore: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
fields.description: The Phoenix willingly ends his current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area.
fields.name: Supernova

fields.lore: PKAWW! BOOM
fields.description: Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fields.name: Launch Fire Spirit

fields.lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
fields.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units he comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to his original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
fields.name: Icarus Dive
fields.notes: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

fields.lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
fields.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units he comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to his original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
fields.name: Icarus Dive
fields.notes: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

fields.lore: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
fields.description: Drawing from his own inner fire, Phoenix expels a huge beam of light at the cost of his own life energy. The beam damages enemies for a percentage of their life and heals allies for half the amount. Damage scales up to twice the initial damage as the beam fires.
fields.name: Sun Ray

fields.name: Supernova

fields.lore: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.
fields.description: Regenerates a portion of the attacked enemy's current HP and deals the same portion of damage per attack.
fields.name: Feast
fields.notes: Does not affect Roshan. Affects magic immune units. The heal is independent of the damage. Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

fields.lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
fields.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movespeed and allowing all allies to lifesteal on that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
fields.name: Open Wounds
fields.notes: Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 70% / 70% / 60% / 50% / 30% / 10% / 10% / 10%, with the slow decreasing one step per second. Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

fields.lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
fields.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movespeed and allowing all allies to lifesteal on that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
fields.name: Open Wounds
fields.notes: Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 70% / 70% / 60% / 50% / 30% / 10% / 10% / 10%, with the slow decreasing one step per second. Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

fields.lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
fields.description: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming immune to magic spells and gaining increased attack speed.
fields.name: Rage
fields.notes: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.

fields.lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
fields.description: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming immune to magic spells and gaining increased attack speed.
fields.name: Rage
fields.notes: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.

fields.lore: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.
fields.description: Lifestealer will infest the body of the target unit, lying dormant and undetectable inside. When he reveals himself, he deals damage to all nearby enemy units. If the unit is a creep, he will devour it first, gaining health equal to the unit's current HP.  Does not work on enemy Heroes.
fields.name: Infest
fields.notes: If the infested unit dies before Lifestealer consumes it, no health is gained. Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.

fields.lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
fields.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage while gaining a bonus to her damage.  These effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances
fields.name: Refraction
fields.notes: Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges). The damage and block instances are separate. Only instances of 5 or more damage will trigger Refraction.

fields.lore: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.
fields.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.
fields.name: Psi Blades
fields.notes: Spill damage hits invisible units. Attack effects like Unique Attack Modifiers and Bash will only be applied to the main target. Attacks against illusions will not spill.

fields.lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
fields.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage while gaining a bonus to her damage.  These effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances
fields.name: Refraction
fields.notes: Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges). The damage and block instances are separate. Only instances of 5 or more damage will trigger Refraction.

fields.lore: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.
fields.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, gaining invisibility while remaining still.  On the next attacked enemy unit, Lanaya will reduce its armor and deal bonus damage to it.
fields.name: Meld
fields.notes: Meld is broken by any action other than staying in position. Doesn't work against towers.

fields.lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
fields.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage while gaining a bonus to her damage.  These effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances
fields.name: Refraction
fields.notes: Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges). The damage and block instances are separate. Only instances of 5 or more damage will trigger Refraction.

fields.lore: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
fields.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung, at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow more by 5% for each second up to 50%.
fields.name: Psionic Trap
fields.notes: Traps last indefinitely. They have invisibility that fades in over 2 seconds, magic immunity, and 100 HP. Traps have 400/400 vision range and don't prevent neutral camps from spawning.

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
fields.description: When activated, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage.
fields.name: Spiked Carapace
fields.notes: The damage is calculated after all reductions. Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.

fields.lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
fields.description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
fields.name: Mana Burn

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
fields.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
fields.name: Vendetta
fields.notes: Has a 0 second fadetime. If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.

fields.lore: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.
fields.description: Banishes the targeted unit, removing it from play for the duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.
fields.name: Disruption

fields.lore: Trying to resist the Shadow Demon's corruption is mostly a useless endeavor.
fields.description: Curses a random enemy in an area to take increased damage.  The bonus damage is dealt as a separate instance of damage.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.
fields.name: Soul Catcher

fields.lore: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
fields.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
fields.name: Shadow Poison
fields.notes: Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.

fields.lore: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
fields.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
fields.name: Shadow Poison
fields.notes: Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.

fields.name: Shadow Poison

fields.lore: Once Shadow Demon no longer has any need for his collected cultist, he releases it from its subservience - and its life.
fields.description: Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.
fields.name: Demonic Purge
fields.notes: Demonic Purge will slow magic immune units.

fields.lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
fields.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
fields.name: Crypt Swarm
fields.notes: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.

fields.lore: With each death, Krobelus adds necromantic power to her repertoire.
fields.description: Increases the potency of Death Prophet's spells, while providing a passive movement speed boost.  Reduces mana costs and cooldowns of Crypt Swarm and Silence, and adds additional spirits to Exorcism.
fields.name: Witchcraft

fields.lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
fields.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
fields.name: Crypt Swarm
fields.notes: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.

fields.lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
fields.description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
fields.name: Silence
fields.notes: Doesn't prevent usage of items.

fields.lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
fields.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
fields.name: Crypt Swarm
fields.notes: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.

fields.lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
fields.description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 30 seconds.
fields.name: Exorcism
fields.notes: Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet. Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.

fields.description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 30 seconds.
fields.name: Exorcism
fields.notes: Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet. Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.

fields.lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
fields.description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
fields.name: Silence
fields.notes: Doesn't prevent usage of items.

fields.description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
fields.name: Silence
fields.notes: Doesn't prevent usage of items.

fields.lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
fields.description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
fields.name: Silence
fields.notes: Doesn't prevent usage of items.

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
fields.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
fields.name: Dragon Blood

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
fields.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
fields.name: Dragon Tail

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
fields.description:
Dragon Knight can take the form of three powerful elder dragons.
LEVEL 1 - Green Dragon: Short poison damage over time on attack.
LEVEL 2 - Red Dragon: Splash damage on attack.
LEVEL 3 - Blue Dragon: Splash damage and frost attack that slows enemy units.
fields.name: Elder Dragon Form
fields.notes: Level 1 Dragon's Corrosive Breath deals 20 damage per second and lasts 5 seconds, and works on structures. Level 2 Dragon's Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% in a 100/200/250 radius, and has level 1's Corrosive Breath. Level 3 Dragon's Frost Breath slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20%, lasting 3 seconds.
