fields.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

fields.lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
fields.description:
Allows Weaver to dispatch two swarms, attacking an enemy twice.

The extra attack will not trigger other attack effects (such as critical strike) and overrides Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Geminate Attack

fields.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

fields.lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
fields.description:
Allows Weaver to dispatch two swarms, attacking an enemy twice.

The extra attack will not trigger other attack effects (such as critical strike) and overrides Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Geminate Attack

fields.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

fields.lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
fields.description: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.
fields.name: Time Lapse
fields.notes: Removes most negative buffs from Weaver.

fields.lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.
fields.description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
fields.name: The Swarm
fields.notes: When a beetle latches on a target, it will remain there until it is killed or the duration expires. Beetles are magic immune, but can be killed in 4 attacks from a hero, or 8 from other units. Every 1.35 seconds, the beetle will attack its target, dealing damage and reducing the target's armor by 1 until the beetle is killed or the duration expires. Beetles provide 321/321 sight, but will drop off their target if it becomes invisible.

fields.name: Geminate Attack

fields.name: Time Lapse
fields.notes: Removes most negative buffs from Weaver.

fields.lore: Warlock arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.
fields.description: Demnok whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
fields.name: Shadow Word
fields.notes: A hero affected by Shadow Word may be denied once it falls below 25% of its maximum health.

fields.lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
fields.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing 20% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
fields.name: Fatal Bonds
fields.notes: Damage will not disable abilities or items like Blink Dagger which require player based damage.

fields.lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
fields.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing 20% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
fields.name: Fatal Bonds
fields.notes: Damage will not disable abilities or items like Blink Dagger which require player based damage.

fields.name: Fatal Bonds
fields.notes: Damage will not disable abilities or items like Blink Dagger which require player based damage.

fields.lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
fields.description:
Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Chaotic Offering
fields.notes: Magic immune units will be stunned. This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.

fields.lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
fields.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing 20% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

fields.description: Demnok whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
fields.name: Shadow Word
fields.notes: A hero affected by Shadow Word may be denied once it falls below 25% of its maximum health.

fields.lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
fields.description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds, slowing enemies up to 84%.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
fields.name: Upheaval
fields.notes: The slow increase is based on length of the channel, not the duration an enemy was standing in the area.

fields.lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
fields.description:
Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Chaotic Offering
fields.notes: Magic immune units will be stunned. This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
fields.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
fields.name: Teleportation
fields.notes: Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast. Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting. When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
fields.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
fields.name: Sprout
fields.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground. Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
fields.description:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Wrath of Nature
fields.notes: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision. Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
fields.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
fields.name: Paralyzing Cask
fields.notes: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

fields.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
fields.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in an area, causing them to take damage every 4 seconds, adding bonus damage for every 100 HP lost since the curse began.
fields.name: Maledict
fields.notes: Damage is based on the difference between the HP values currently and when Maledict was cast.

fields.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
fields.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
fields.name: Paralyzing Cask
fields.notes: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

fields.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
fields.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in an area, causing them to take damage every 4 seconds, adding bonus damage for every 100 HP lost since the curse began.
fields.name: Maledict
fields.notes: Damage is based on the difference between the HP values currently and when Maledict was cast.

fields.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
fields.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
fields.name: Paralyzing Cask
fields.notes: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

fields.lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes.  The Death Ward has attack range of 700, and attacks every .25 seconds.  Level 3 Death Ward bounces once. Lasts 8 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Death Ward
fields.notes: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires. The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.

fields.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
fields.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
fields.name: Paralyzing Cask
fields.notes: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

fields.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
fields.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in an area, causing them to take damage every 4 seconds, adding bonus damage for every 100 HP lost since the curse began.
fields.name: Maledict
fields.notes: Damage is based on the difference between the HP values currently and when Maledict was cast.

fields.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
fields.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in an area, causing them to take damage every 4 seconds, adding bonus damage for every 100 HP lost since the curse began.
fields.name: Maledict
fields.notes: Damage is based on the difference between the HP values currently and when Maledict was cast.

fields.lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes.  The Death Ward has attack range of 700, and attacks every .25 seconds.  Level 3 Death Ward bounces once. Lasts 8 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Death Ward
fields.notes: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires. The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.

fields.lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
fields.description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.
fields.name: Voodoo Restoration
fields.notes: Healing is done in 0.33 second intervals. Can heal magic immune units.

fields.lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.

fields.notes: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires. The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
fields.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.
fields.name: Rocket Flare

fields.lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
fields.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
fields.name: Power Cogs
fields.notes: Cogs can shock invisible units.

fields.lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
fields.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.
fields.name: Rocket Flare

fields.lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
fields.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.
fields.name: Rocket Flare

fields.lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
fields.description:
Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a non-neutral unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are subject to damage and stunned. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Hookshot
fields.notes: Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them. Neutral creeps stop the hook with no effect.

fields.name: Power Cogs
fields.notes: Cogs can shock invisible units.

fields.lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
fields.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.
fields.name: Battery Assault
fields.notes: Deals damage every 0.7 seconds. Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled. Total damage: 240/560/880/1200

fields.lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
fields.description:
Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.

Poison Attack is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Poison Attack
fields.notes: Successive casts don't increase slow or damage, but refresh the duration.

fields.lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
fields.description: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target.   Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.
fields.name: Nethertoxin

fields.lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
fields.description: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target.   Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.
fields.name: Nethertoxin

fields.lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
fields.description:
Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.

Poison Attack is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Poison Attack
fields.notes: Successive casts don't increase slow or damage, but refresh the duration.

fields.lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
fields.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to spells.
fields.name: Corrosive Skin
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.
fields.description:
Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Viper Strike
fields.notes: Slow works on magic immune units. Units afflicted by Viper Strike can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.

fields.lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
fields.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.
fields.name: Sticky Napalm
fields.notes: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.

fields.lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
fields.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a flaming trail from the air.  While flying, the trail of fire destroys trees and damages enemies in its path, and Batrider gains the movement capabilities of a flying unit.
fields.name: Firefly
fields.notes: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain. If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck. The fire destroys trees. The trail persists through Batrider's death.

fields.lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
fields.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.
fields.name: Sticky Napalm
fields.notes: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.

fields.lore: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
fields.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back and dealing damage to enemies in the area.
fields.name: Flamebreak

fields.lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
fields.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.
fields.name: Sticky Napalm
fields.notes: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.

fields.lore: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
fields.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.
fields.name: Flaming Lasso
fields.notes: Killing the target or the Batrider will break the lasso before its expiration. If Batrider moves more than 400 units in 0.05 seconds the lasso breaks. Disable works on magic immune units. Batrider cannot attack while using Flaming Lasso.

fields.lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
fields.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.
fields.name: Sticky Napalm
fields.notes: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.

fields.lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
fields.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a flaming trail from the air.  While flying, the trail of fire destroys trees and damages enemies in its path, and Batrider gains the movement capabilities of a flying unit.
fields.name: Firefly
fields.notes: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain. If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck. The fire destroys trees. The trail persists through Batrider's death.

fields.lore: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
fields.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back and dealing damage to enemies in the area.
fields.name: Flamebreak

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
fields.description: When activated, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage.
fields.name: Spiked Carapace
fields.notes: The damage is calculated after all reductions. Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
fields.description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
fields.name: Mana Burn

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
fields.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
fields.name: Vendetta
fields.notes: Has a 0 second fadetime. If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.

fields.lore: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.
fields.description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.
fields.name: Grave Chill
fields.notes: The two buffs can be removed separately by purge. The speed gained is independent of the speed lost on the target.

fields.lore: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.
fields.description: Visage damages the targeted unit based on the number of soul charges.  Visage gains a soul charge when damage taken by all heroes around him reaches the damage threshold.
fields.name: Soul Assumption
fields.notes: Charges are only gained for damage greater than 2 and less than 3000 that is dealt by a player or Roshan.  Self-damage or Soul Assumption damage isn't counted.

fields.lore: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.
fields.description: Visage damages the targeted unit based on the number of soul charges.  Visage gains a soul charge when damage taken by all heroes around him reaches the damage threshold.
fields.name: Soul Assumption
fields.notes: Charges are only gained for damage greater than 2 and less than 3000 that is dealt by a player or Roshan.  Self-damage or Soul Assumption damage isn't counted.

fields.lore: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.
fields.description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from physical and magical attacks.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
fields.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
fields.notes: Each time Visage receives damage greater than 2 that was not self-inflicted and was from a player owned source, a layer is removed.

fields.lore: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.
fields.description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from physical and magical attacks.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
fields.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
fields.notes: Each time Visage receives damage greater than 2 that was not self-inflicted and was from a player owned source, a layer is removed.

fields.lore: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.
fields.description:
Conjures up two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars have high attack power, but each attack drains a charge of damage that recharges slowly over time.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health and damage.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Summon Familiars
fields.notes: Casting Summon Familiars will replace any existing Familiars. Each Familiar starts with 7 damage charges, and have 96.25% magic resistance.  Many stuns and slows have no effect on Familiars.

fields.lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.
fields.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
fields.name: Venomous Gale
fields.notes: Units afflicted by Venomous Gale can be denied when their HP drops below 25%. Duration damage is dealt every 3 seconds. Slow starts at 50%, and decreases as time passes.

fields.lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
fields.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.
fields.name: Poison Sting
fields.notes: Poison Sting damage can be lethal.

fields.lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.

fields.name: Venomous Gale
fields.notes: Units afflicted by Venomous Gale can be denied when their HP drops below 25%. Duration damage is dealt every 3 seconds. Slow starts at 50%, and decreases as time passes.

fields.lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
fields.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.
fields.name: Poison Sting
fields.notes: Poison Sting damage can be lethal.

fields.lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.
fields.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
fields.name: Plague Ward

fields.lore: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.
fields.description:
A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova's effect cannot bring units below 1 HP.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Poison Nova
fields.notes: Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage (target will be left with 1 HP).

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
fields.description: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.
fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
fields.description: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.
fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
fields.description: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.
fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
fields.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

fields.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
fields.description: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.
fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.notes: Hits magic immune units.

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
fields.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

fields.lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
fields.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
fields.name: Ice Path
fields.notes: It takes 0.5 seconds for the path to reach its full extent.

fields.lore: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.
fields.description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.
fields.name: Liquid Fire
fields.notes: Works on both units and buildings.

fields.lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
fields.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
fields.name: Ice Path
fields.notes: It takes 0.5 seconds for the path to reach its full extent.

fields.lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.
fields.description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
fields.name: Dual Breath
fields.notes: Can hit units up to 950 range away. Has a 0.3 second interval between each breath.

fields.lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.

fields.name: Dual Breath
fields.notes: Can hit units up to 950 range away. Has a 0.3 second interval between each breath.

fields.lore: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
fields.description:
Jakiro lays down a line of flame in front of him, each dealing damage per second to enemy units in a wide area of effect.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Macropyre
fields.notes: Macropyre destroys trees in its path.

fields.lore: Both friend and foe alike recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
fields.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
fields.name: Leap
fields.notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.

fields.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
fields.description: Fires an arrow with deadly precision, dealing large damage and stunning the first enemy unit it strikes. Stun duration increases based on distance to target, ranging from 0.5 to 5 seconds. Bonus damage up to 100 is applied based on distance to target.
fields.name: Sacred Arrow
fields.notes: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds. Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

fields.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
fields.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. One random enemy unit in 175 range will take a second hit for 75% of the damage.
fields.name: Starstorm
fields.notes: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere. Starstorm cannot hit invisible units. Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

fields.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
fields.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. One random enemy unit in 175 range will take a second hit for 75% of the damage.
fields.name: Starstorm
fields.notes: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere. Starstorm cannot hit invisible units. Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

fields.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
fields.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. One random enemy unit in 175 range will take a second hit for 75% of the damage.
fields.name: Starstorm
fields.notes: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere. Starstorm cannot hit invisible units. Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

fields.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
fields.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If Invisibility is broken, it will restore after fade delay if the shadow's duration has not expired.  Silence will stop Moonlight Shadow.
fields.name: Moonlight Shadow
fields.notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies. Magic immune allies will be affected.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
fields.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
fields.name: Phase Shift
fields.notes: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift. Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift. Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
fields.description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
fields.name: Waning Rift

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.

fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
fields.description:
Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for .5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, deals damage again and stuns.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dream Coil

fields.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
fields.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
fields.name: Static Remnant
fields.notes: Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast. Remnants grant flying vision for their duration. The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.

fields.lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
fields.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
fields.name: Overload
fields.notes: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.

fields.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
fields.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Electric Vortex

fields.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
fields.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Electric Vortex

fields.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
fields.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Electric Vortex

fields.lore: The Storm is coming in.
fields.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The mana activation cost is 15+7% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+1% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
fields.name: Ball Lightning
fields.notes: Instant cast abilities can be used while traveling. This ability will destroy trees. Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
fields.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
fields.name: Teleportation
fields.notes: Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast. Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting. When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
fields.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
fields.name: Sprout
fields.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground. Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.

fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
fields.description:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Wrath of Nature
fields.notes: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision. Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.

fields.lore: Ezalor disrupts Primordial harmony, draining magical energy from those with poor constitution.
fields.description: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.
fields.name: Mana Leak
fields.notes: If the target travels over 300 distance in less than 0.1 second (by using blink skills, for example), Mana Leak will not decrease its mana for that distance.

fields.lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
fields.description: Channels a ball of light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, the ball deals damage and gives vision in a line.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage dealt.
fields.name: Illuminate
fields.notes: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time. Damages mechanical units.

fields.lore: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.
fields.description: Restores mana to the target unit.
fields.name: Chakra Magic

fields.lore: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.
fields.description: Restores mana to the target unit.
fields.name: Chakra Magic

fields.lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
fields.description: Channels a ball of light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, the ball deals damage and gives vision in a line.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage dealt.
fields.name: Illuminate
fields.notes: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time. Damages mechanical units.

fields.lore: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.
fields.description: Restores mana to the target unit.
fields.name: Chakra Magic

fields.lore: In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.
fields.description: Ezalor turns his body luminescent temporarily, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.
fields.name: Spirit Form

fields.lore: In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.
fields.description: Ezalor turns his body luminescent temporarily, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.
fields.name: Spirit Form

fields.lore: Ezalor disrupts Primordial harmony, draining magical energy from those with poor constitution.
fields.description: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.
fields.name: Mana Leak
fields.notes: If the target travels over 300 distance in less than 0.1 second (by using blink skills, for example), Mana Leak will not decrease its mana for that distance.

fields.lore: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
fields.description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark illusion of the targeted enemy Hero. The enemy Hero is slowed and attacked by the illusion for a short duration.
fields.name: Reflection
fields.notes: Reflections are untargetable, invulnernable illusions. Reflections can only attack their source.

fields.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
fields.name: Metamorphosis

fields.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
fields.name: Metamorphosis

fields.lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!
fields.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
fields.name: Conjure Image

fields.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
fields.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
fields.name: Metamorphosis

fields.lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
fields.description: Severs the soul from both Terrorblade and a target hero, then exchanges them, carrying part of the units' life forces. The percentage hit points of each unit are switched with the souls. Some hit points must remain.
fields.name: Sunder

fields.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation. The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Shadow Walk

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
fields.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.
fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.notes: This spell interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
fields.description: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.
fields.name: Track
fields.notes: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died. Gives True Sight as well as shared vision of the target. Track's effect is only visible to allies. The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold. Bonus gold is reliable gold.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
fields.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around you. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
fields.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units he comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to his original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
fields.name: Icarus Dive
fields.notes: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

fields.name: Fire Spirits

fields.lore: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
fields.description: The Phoenix willingly ends his current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area.
fields.name: Supernova

fields.lore: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
fields.description: Drawing from his own inner fire, Phoenix expels a huge beam of light at the cost of his own life energy. The beam damages enemies for a percentage of their life and heals allies for half the amount. Damage scales up to twice the initial damage as the beam fires.
fields.name: Sun Ray

fields.name: Supernova

fields.description: Allows manipulation of fire elements and grants a permanent intelligence bonus. Each Exort instance provides increased attack damage.
fields.name: Exort
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.
fields.name: Quas
fields.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

fields.lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
fields.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated, creating a new spell at the Invoker's disposal. Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Invoke
fields.notes: The arrangement of instances does not matter.

fields.lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
fields.description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.
fields.name: Devour
fields.notes: Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold. The amount of time it takes to Devour depends on the current HP of the unit. Doom can't Devour mechanical or ancient units. If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.

fields.lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
fields.description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames, damaging enemies while Doom gains bonus HP regen and increased movement speed.
fields.name: Scorched Earth
fields.notes: Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location. Other units Doom controls also benefit from Scorched Earth.

fields.lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.

fields.notes: Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location. Other units Doom controls also benefit from Scorched Earth.

fields.lore: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.
fields.description: Dissipates a piece of an enemy Hero's soul, mini-stunning and dealing bonus damage equal to 20% of the target's maximum health when the enemy's level is a multiple of a specific number or 25.
fields.name: LVL? Death
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
fields.description:
Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.  Doom also disables most passive abilities and removes positive buffs on cast. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Doom
fields.notes: Doom damages units through magic immunity. Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

fields.lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
fields.description:
Allows Weaver to dispatch two swarms, attacking an enemy twice.

The extra attack will not trigger other attack effects (such as critical strike) and overrides Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Geminate Attack

fields.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

fields.lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.
fields.description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
fields.name: The Swarm
fields.notes: When a beetle latches on a target, it will remain there until it is killed or the duration expires. Beetles are magic immune, but can be killed in 4 attacks from a hero, or 8 from other units. Every 1.35 seconds, the beetle will attack its target, dealing damage and reducing the target's armor by 1 until the beetle is killed or the duration expires. Beetles provide 321/321 sight, but will drop off their target if it becomes invisible.

fields.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
fields.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
fields.name: Shukuchi
fields.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

fields.lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
fields.description: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.
fields.name: Time Lapse
fields.notes: Removes most negative buffs from Weaver.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
fields.description: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target.   Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.
fields.name: Nethertoxin

fields.lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
fields.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to spells.
fields.name: Corrosive Skin
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
fields.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to spells.
fields.name: Corrosive Skin
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
fields.description:
Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.

Poison Attack is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Poison Attack
fields.notes: Successive casts don't increase slow or damage, but refresh the duration.

fields.lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
fields.description: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target.   Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.
fields.name: Nethertoxin

fields.lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.
fields.description:
Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Viper Strike
fields.notes: Slow works on magic immune units. Units afflicted by Viper Strike can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.

fields.lore: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
fields.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
fields.name: Telekinesis
fields.notes: While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction. When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun. The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.

fields.lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
fields.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.
fields.name: Fade Bolt

fields.lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
fields.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects his allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.
fields.name: Null Field
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.

fields.lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
