fields.name: Null Field
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

fields.lore: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.
fields.description:
Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Spell Steal
fields.notes: Cannot steal item abilities.

fields.lore: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
fields.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
fields.name: Telekinesis
fields.notes: While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction. When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun. The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

fields.notes: Cannot steal item abilities.

fields.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.
fields.name: Fade Bolt

fields.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation. The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

fields.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
fields.name: Jinada

fields.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
fields.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation. The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

fields.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
fields.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.
fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.notes: This spell interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
fields.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.
fields.name: Shuriken Toss
fields.notes: This spell interrupts channeling abilities.

fields.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
fields.description: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.
fields.name: Track
fields.notes: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died. Gives True Sight as well as shared vision of the target. Track's effect is only visible to allies. The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold. Bonus gold is reliable gold.

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.notes: Hits magic immune units.

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
fields.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

fields.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
fields.description: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.
fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
fields.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.

fields.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

fields.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
fields.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
fields.name: Dragon Tail

fields.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
fields.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
fields.name: Dragon Blood

fields.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
fields.description: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.
fields.name: Breathe Fire
fields.notes: Affects mechanical units. Hits units up to 900 away.

fields.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
fields.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
fields.name: Dragon Tail

fields.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
fields.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
fields.name: Dragon Tail

fields.lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
fields.description:
Dragon Knight can take the form of three powerful elder dragons.
LEVEL 1 - Green Dragon: Short poison damage over time on attack.
LEVEL 2 - Red Dragon: Splash damage on attack.
LEVEL 3 - Blue Dragon: Splash damage and frost attack that slows enemy units.
fields.name: Elder Dragon Form
fields.notes: Level 1 Dragon's Corrosive Breath deals 20 damage per second and lasts 5 seconds, and works on structures. Level 2 Dragon's Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% in a 100/200/250 radius, and has level 1's Corrosive Breath. Level 3 Dragon's Frost Breath slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20%, lasting 3 seconds.

fields.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
fields.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
fields.name: Sacrifice

fields.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
fields.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
fields.name: Sacrifice

fields.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
fields.description:
Releases an orb of frost that bounces up to 10 times, slowing and damaging enemy units.  The first target is mini-stunned.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Chain Frost
fields.notes: The first target will be immediately interrupted.  This stun goes through magic immunity. Chain Frost cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.lore: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
fields.description: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Has half effect on ranged attackers. Lasts 40 seconds.
fields.name: Ice Armor
fields.notes: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.

fields.lore: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.

fields.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.
fields.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
fields.name: Arc Lightning

fields.lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
fields.description: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.
fields.name: Static Field
fields.notes: The damage from Static Field is dealt before the damage from the used spell. Using items doesn't trigger Static Field. Does not require unit visibility to take effect.

fields.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
fields.description: Summons a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. Lightning Bolt also provides True Sight around the target in a radius of 900.
fields.name: Lightning Bolt
fields.notes: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

fields.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
fields.description: Summons a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. Lightning Bolt also provides True Sight around the target in a radius of 900.
fields.name: Lightning Bolt
fields.notes: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

fields.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
fields.description: Summons a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. Lightning Bolt also provides True Sight around the target in a radius of 900.
fields.name: Lightning Bolt
fields.notes: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

fields.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
fields.description:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Thundergod's Wrath

fields.name: Thundergod's Wrath

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
fields.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
fields.name: Teleportation
fields.notes: Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast. Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting. When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
fields.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
fields.name: Sprout
fields.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground. Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

fields.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
fields.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
fields.name: Nature's Call
fields.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area. Treants have 20% magic resistance.

fields.lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
fields.description:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Wrath of Nature
fields.notes: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision. Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.

fields.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground. Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

fields.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
fields.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
fields.name: Sprout
fields.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground. Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

fields.name: Sprout
fields.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground. Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

fields.lore: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.
fields.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.
fields.name: Thunder Strike

fields.lore: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.
fields.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
fields.name: Kinetic Field
fields.notes: Magic immune units can travel through the field.

fields.lore: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.
fields.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.
fields.name: Thunder Strike

fields.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
fields.name: Kinetic Field
fields.notes: Magic immune units can travel through the field.

fields.lore: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.
fields.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.
fields.name: Glimpse
fields.notes: The travel time is a function of the distance the target will travel.

fields.lore: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.
fields.description:
Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Static Storm

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.
fields.description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.
fields.name: Spectral Dagger
fields.notes: Slows magic immune units. There is a 2 second grace period after leaving the path where no collision is preserved.

fields.lore: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
fields.description: Deals bonus pure damage when Spectre attacks an enemy hero who is alone.
fields.name: Desolate
fields.notes: Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack. Spectre's illusions also have Desolate.

fields.lore: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
fields.description: Deals bonus pure damage when Spectre attacks an enemy hero who is alone.
fields.name: Desolate
fields.notes: Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack. Spectre's illusions also have Desolate.

fields.lore: A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.
fields.description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
fields.name: Dispersion
fields.notes: The reflected damage is not dealt to Spectre. Illusions don't get this ability.

fields.lore: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
fields.description: Deals bonus pure damage when Spectre attacks an enemy hero who is alone.
fields.name: Desolate
fields.notes: Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack. Spectre's illusions also have Desolate.

fields.lore: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.
fields.description:
Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to take the place of a given illusion.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.
fields.name: Haunt
fields.notes: Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, move at 400 base movement speed, and cannot be disabled. There is a 1 second delay before illusions start attacking their target.

fields.notes: Slows magic immune units. There is a 2 second grace period after leaving the path where no collision is preserved.

fields.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
fields.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
fields.name: Torrent
fields.notes: The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies. Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.

fields.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
fields.description: Summons a ghostship to cut a swath through battle, causing damage and stuns to enemy units as it crashes through. Allies are doused in Kunkka's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to damage.
fields.name: Ghostship
fields.notes: Damage dealt after rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.

fields.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
fields.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
fields.name: Tidebringer
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Cooldown isn't activated on denies, so the damage bonus is maintained.

fields.lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
fields.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration.
fields.name: X Marks the Spot
fields.notes: If the target becomes magic immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
fields.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
fields.name: Static Remnant
fields.notes: Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast. Remnants grant flying vision for their duration. The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.

fields.lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
fields.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
fields.name: Overload
fields.notes: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.

fields.lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
fields.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
fields.name: Overload
fields.notes: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.

fields.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
fields.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.
fields.name: Electric Vortex

fields.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
fields.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
fields.name: Static Remnant
fields.notes: Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast. Remnants grant flying vision for their duration. The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.

fields.lore: The Storm is coming in.
fields.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The mana activation cost is 15+7% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+1% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
fields.name: Ball Lightning
fields.notes: Instant cast abilities can be used while traveling. This ability will destroy trees. Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

fields.lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
fields.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.
fields.name: Rocket Flare

fields.lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
fields.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
fields.name: Power Cogs
fields.notes: Cogs can shock invisible units.

fields.lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
fields.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.
fields.name: Battery Assault
fields.notes: Deals damage every 0.7 seconds. Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled. Total damage: 240/560/880/1200

fields.lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
fields.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.
fields.name: Rocket Flare

fields.lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
fields.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.
fields.name: Rocket Flare

fields.lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
fields.description:
Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a non-neutral unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are subject to damage and stunned. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Hookshot
fields.notes: Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them. Neutral creeps stop the hook with no effect.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
fields.name: Shackles

fields.lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
fields.name: Hex
fields.notes: Instantly destroys illusions. The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled. Hex disables damage block and evasion.

fields.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.

fields.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
fields.name: Shackles

fields.lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
fields.description:
Summons 10 serpent wards to attack enemy units and structures. The wards are immune to magic, and have a small area of splash damage that increases per level.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Mass Serpent Ward
fields.notes: Serpent Wards deal piercing type splash damage. Serpent Wards deal 100% damage in a 50/75/85 radius. Serpent Wards deal 40% damage in a 75/100/110 radius. Serpent Wards deal 20% damage in a 150/200/220 radius.

fields.lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
fields.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
fields.name: Ether Shock
fields.notes: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.

fields.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
fields.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
fields.name: Sacrifice

fields.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
fields.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
fields.name: Sacrifice

fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
fields.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
fields.name: Sacrifice

fields.lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
fields.description:
Releases an orb of frost that bounces up to 10 times, slowing and damaging enemy units.  The first target is mini-stunned.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Chain Frost
fields.notes: The first target will be immediately interrupted.  This stun goes through magic immunity. Chain Frost cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
fields.name: Frost Blast

fields.lore: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
fields.description: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Has half effect on ranged attackers. Lasts 40 seconds.
fields.name: Ice Armor
fields.notes: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
fields.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
fields.name: Pounce
fields.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance. Magic immune units cannot be leashed. Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location. Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

fields.lore: With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.
fields.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.
fields.name: Essence Shift
fields.notes: Attributes cannot be dropped below 1. When either Slark or the affected unit dies, the stats are returned to normal.

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
fields.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
fields.name: Pounce
fields.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance. Magic immune units cannot be leashed. Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location. Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

fields.lore: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
fields.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.
fields.name: Dark Pact
fields.notes: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage. Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark. You can't kill yourself with this skill. The pulses stop if Slark dies.

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.

fields.name: Pounce
fields.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance. Magic immune units cannot be leashed. Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location. Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

fields.lore: The hidden Thirteenth is a slippery foe.
fields.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection (attacking, casting spells, and using items do not reveal Slark).  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.
fields.name: Shadow Dance
fields.notes: If Slark is damaged by a neutral unit, the effect is lost for 2 seconds.

fields.lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
fields.description: Shadow Wave heals several allies, which in turn cause damage equal to their healing in a small area around them.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave, and it does not count toward the number of targets.
fields.name: Shadow Wave
fields.notes: Prioritizes allied heroes over creeps. If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they can take multiple instances of damage.

fields.lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
fields.description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.
fields.name: Shallow Grave
fields.notes: HP cannot go below 1 while under the effects of Shallow Grave, but Axe's Culling Blade will still kill the hero.

fields.lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
fields.description:
Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, causing damage and slowness over time, and eventual paralysis.  Poison Touch mini-stuns on impact. Slow increases per level.

Level 1 slows the target by 33% during the set time.

Level 2 slows the target by 33% for 2 seconds, then by 66% for 1 second.

Level 3 slows the target by 33%, 66%, and 100%, for one second respectively.

Level 4 slows the target by 33%, then slows the target by 66% for 1 second, then stuns the target for 1 second.
fields.name: Poison Touch
fields.notes: The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities. The initial ministun will cancel channeling.

fields.lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
fields.description:
Applies a buff that increases allied hero armor or decreases enemy hero armor in the target area over time.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Weave
fields.notes: Places a buff on units, so entering or leaving the area after the cast has no effect.

fields.lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
fields.description: Gives control of an enemy or neutral creep, and gives it bonus hit points.
fields.name: Holy Persuasion
fields.notes: You can take control of only non-Ancient type creeps. When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.

fields.lore: Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.
fields.description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.
fields.name: Test of Faith

fields.notes: You can take control of only non-Ancient type creeps. When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.

fields.lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
fields.description: Gives control of an enemy or neutral creep, and gives it bonus hit points.
fields.name: Holy Persuasion
fields.notes: You can take control of only non-Ancient type creeps. When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.

fields.lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
fields.description:
Fully regenerates any creeps under Chen's control and heals all allied heroes on the map.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Hand of God
fields.notes: Heals magic immune units.

fields.lore: Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.
fields.description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.
fields.name: Test of Faith

fields.lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.
fields.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.
fields.name: Penitence
fields.notes: Bonus damage will always be physical (reduced by armor), regardless of the damage source.

fields.lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
fields.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
fields.name: Ion Shell
fields.notes: Deals small amounts of damage in 0.1 intervals. Doesn't damage the target it is cast on. If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.

fields.lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.
fields.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.
fields.name: Surge
fields.notes: Units with Surge cannot be slowed unless the Surge effect is removed.

fields.lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
fields.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
fields.name: Ion Shell
fields.notes: Deals small amounts of damage in 0.1 intervals. Doesn't damage the target it is cast on. If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.

fields.lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.
fields.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
fields.name: Vacuum
fields.notes: This ability interrupts channeling. Pulls units over 0.4 seconds before dealing damage. Doesn't pull invulnerable units.

fields.name: Ion Shell
fields.notes: Deals small amounts of damage in 0.1 intervals. Doesn't damage the target it is cast on. If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.

fields.lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.
fields.description:
Raises a wall of warping light that damages and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Wall of Replica
fields.notes: Doesn't create illusions from other illusions, or Meepo clones. Creates a wall 1000 units long, perpendicular to the line between Dark Seer and the target point.

fields.lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
fields.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
fields.name: Blink
fields.notes: If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead. You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.

fields.lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
fields.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
fields.name: Shadow Strike
fields.notes: The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration. Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25%% of their maximum health.

fields.lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
fields.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
fields.name: Scream Of Pain
fields.notes: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units. Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
fields.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
fields.name: Scream Of Pain
fields.notes: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units. Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

fields.name: Scream Of Pain
fields.notes: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units. Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
fields.description:
Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Sonic Wave
fields.notes: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1200 units away.

fields.lore: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.
fields.description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.
fields.name: Quill Spray
fields.notes: Quill Spray damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.

fields.lore: Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.
fields.description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 250 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.
fields.name: Bristleback
fields.notes: Bristleback's rear is considered to be within 70 degrees from the back. Bristleback's side is considered to be within 110 degrees from the back.

fields.lore: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.

fields.name: Quill Spray

fields.name: Quill Spray

fields.lore: 'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided.  But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.
fields.description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.  The first stack (base) provides larger bonuses.
fields.name: Warpath
fields.notes: Bristleback's illusions will receive the bonuses. Items will not trigger Warpath.

fields.lore: Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.
fields.description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.
fields.name: Viscous Nasal Goo

fields.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
fields.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
fields.name: Phase Shift
fields.notes: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift. Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift. Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
fields.description: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
fields.name: Illusory Orb
fields.notes: The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels. Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

fields.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
fields.description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
fields.name: Waning Rift

fields.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.

fields.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
fields.description:
Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for .5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, deals damage again and stuns.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Dream Coil

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.notes: Hits magic immune units.

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
fields.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.notes: Hits magic immune units.

fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.notes: Hits magic immune units.

fields.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
fields.description: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.
fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
fields.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

fields.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
fields.description: Fires an arrow with deadly precision, dealing large damage and stunning the first enemy unit it strikes. Stun duration increases based on distance to target, ranging from 0.5 to 5 seconds. Bonus damage up to 100 is applied based on distance to target.
fields.name: Sacred Arrow
fields.notes: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds. Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

fields.lore: Both friend and foe alike recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
fields.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
fields.name: Leap
fields.notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.

fields.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
fields.description: Fires an arrow with deadly precision, dealing large damage and stunning the first enemy unit it strikes. Stun duration increases based on distance to target, ranging from 0.5 to 5 seconds. Bonus damage up to 100 is applied based on distance to target.
fields.name: Sacred Arrow
fields.notes: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds. Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

fields.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
fields.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. One random enemy unit in 175 range will take a second hit for 75% of the damage.
fields.name: Starstorm
fields.notes: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere. Starstorm cannot hit invisible units. Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

fields.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.

fields.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
fields.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If Invisibility is broken, it will restore after fade delay if the shadow's duration has not expired.  Silence will stop Moonlight Shadow.
fields.name: Moonlight Shadow
fields.notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies. Magic immune allies will be affected.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
fields.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
fields.name: Blade Dance

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
fields.description: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
fields.name: Healing Ward
fields.notes: The healing ward can be controlled. Multiple healing wards don't stack.

fields.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
fields.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
fields.name: Blade Fury
fields.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units. You can use items during Blade Fury. If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit. Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.

fields.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
fields.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Omnislash
fields.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target. Can target magic immune units. Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds. Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash. You can use items during Omnislash.

fields.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
fields.name: Searing Chains
fields.notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin. Does not affect magic immune or invisible units. Interrupts channeling spells.

fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

fields.description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.
fields.name: Sleight of Fist
fields.notes: Targets are determined when the spell is cast. A regular attack is done to each target every 0.2 seconds. Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.

fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

fields.description: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 35 seconds, with a max of 3 charges.  Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.
fields.name: Fire Remnant
fields.notes: Starts with 3 charges (maximum). Fire Remnants move to where you targeted them at 2.5x your speed.

fields.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
fields.name: Flame Guard
fields.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

fields.lore: Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.
fields.description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.
fields.name: Shockwave

fields.lore: Magnoceros horns are valuable in direct proportion to their danger to prospective merchants.
fields.description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.
fields.name: Skewer
fields.notes: Doesn't affect magic immune units.

fields.lore: Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.
fields.description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.

fields.name: Shockwave

fields.lore: Magnus fights with the fury of the erupting Mt. Joerlak.
fields.description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
fields.name: Reverse Polarity
fields.notes: Disable and pull work through magic immunity.

fields.lore: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
fields.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.
fields.name: Empower
fields.notes: The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes. Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value. Cleave damage goes through magic immunity. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

fields.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
fields.name: Leap
fields.notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.

fields.lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.
fields.description:
Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to explode violently upon death, spreading area damage.

Caustic Finale is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
fields.name: Caustic Finale
fields.notes: Units afflicted with the debuff will explode even if Sand King did not deliver the killing blow. The buff is not placed on allied units.

fields.lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.
fields.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
fields.name: Burrowstrike

fields.lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

fields.lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Epicenter
fields.notes: The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell. The pulses have gradually inreasing radius: 275 / 325 / 375 / 425 / 475 / 525 / 575 / 650 / 675 / 700 ( 775 / 825 *).

fields.lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.
fields.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
fields.name: Burrowstrike

fields.lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.
fields.name: Sand Storm
fields.notes: Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.

fields.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Earth Spike
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

fields.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
fields.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
fields.name: Hex
fields.notes: Instantly destroys illusions. The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled. Hex disables damage block and evasion.

fields.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.notes: Destroys illusions after 0.25 seconds.

fields.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
fields.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
fields.name: Mana Drain
fields.notes: Destroys illusions after 0.25 seconds.

fields.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Earth Spike
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

fields.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
fields.description:
Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Finger of Death
fields.notes: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

fields.lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of forboding.
fields.description: Throws out a web that renders Broodmother invisible in its vicinity, while also boosting regeneration, and granting a passive movement speed increase.  Webs never expire, but when the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. You have free movement capabilities while on the Web when the enemy cannot see you.
fields.name: Spin Web
fields.notes: Has a fade time of 2 seconds. Also affects Spiderling and Spiderites.

fields.lore: Paralytic toxins come from Black Arachnia's fangs, causing a slow and painful death to those who intrude on her webs.
fields.description:
Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

Incapacitating Bite is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
fields.name: Incapacitating Bite
fields.notes: The miss chance stacks with evasion and terrain dodge chance.

fields.lore: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.
fields.description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
fields.name: Insatiable Hunger
fields.notes: Fully stacks with other sources of lifesteal. Insatiable hunger can be removed by purge effects.

fields.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
fields.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.
fields.name: Frostbite
fields.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 5 or lower.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
fields.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
fields.name: Crystal Nova

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
fields.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.
fields.name: Arcane Aura
fields.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses. The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

fields.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
fields.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fields.name: Freezing Field
fields.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second). Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 70 explosions.

fields.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

fields.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
fields.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
fields.name: Pounce
fields.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance. Magic immune units cannot be leashed. Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location. Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

fields.lore: With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.
fields.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.
fields.name: Essence Shift
fields.notes: Attributes cannot be dropped below 1. When either Slark or the affected unit dies, the stats are returned to normal.

fields.lore: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
fields.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.
fields.name: Dark Pact
fields.notes: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage. Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark. You can't kill yourself with this skill. The pulses stop if Slark dies.

fields.lore: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
fields.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.
fields.name: Dark Pact
fields.notes: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage. Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark. You can't kill yourself with this skill. The pulses stop if Slark dies.

fields.name: Dark Pact
fields.notes: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage. Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark. You can't kill yourself with this skill. The pulses stop if Slark dies.

fields.lore: The hidden Thirteenth is a slippery foe.
fields.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection (attacking, casting spells, and using items do not reveal Slark).  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.
fields.name: Shadow Dance
fields.notes: If Slark is damaged by a neutral unit, the effect is lost for 2 seconds.
