fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.notes: Hits magic immune units.

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.notes: Hits magic immune units.

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
fields.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

fields.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
fields.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
fields.name: Unstable Concoction
fields.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing. A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds. You can deny yourself with this skill. Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.

fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray
fields.notes: Hits magic immune units.

fields.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
fields.description: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.
fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
fields.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
fields.name: Acid Spray

fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.description: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.
fields.name: Greevil's Greed

fields.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
fields.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
fields.name: Chemical Rage
fields.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
fields.description: When activated, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage.
fields.name: Spiked Carapace
fields.notes: The damage is calculated after all reductions. Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
fields.description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
fields.name: Mana Burn

fields.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
fields.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
fields.name: Impale
fields.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.

fields.lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
fields.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
fields.name: Vendetta
fields.notes: Has a 0 second fadetime. If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.

fields.name: Staff of Wizardry
fields.lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

fields.name: Ogre Club
fields.lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

fields.name: Healing Salve
fields.notes: Flask is shareable.
fields.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
fields.description: Use: Regenerate - Restores HP over time. If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.

fields.name: Platemail
fields.lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

fields.name: Broadsword
fields.lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

fields.name: Mithril Hammer
fields.lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

fields.name: Gloves of Haste
fields.lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

fields.name: Mantle of Intelligence
fields.lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

fields.name: Refresher Orb
fields.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.
fields.description: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

fields.name: Reaver
fields.lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

fields.name: Chainmail
fields.lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

fields.name: Talisman of Evasion
fields.lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

fields.name: Sange
fields.lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
fields.description: Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.

fields.name: Clarity
fields.notes: Clarity is shareable.
fields.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.
fields.description: Use: Restores mana over time. If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.

fields.name: Tango
fields.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.
fields.description: Use: Eat Tree - Consume a tree to restore HP over time. Comes with 3 charges.

fields.name: Sacred Relic
fields.lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

fields.name: Slippers of Agility
fields.lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

fields.name: Ultimate Orb
fields.lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

fields.name: Shadow Amulet
fields.description: Active: Fade - Go invisible over 1.8 seconds. If you move, you will become visible.

fields.name: Blade of Alacrity
fields.lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

fields.name: Mystic Staff
fields.lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

fields.name: Circlet
fields.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

fields.name: Demon Edge
fields.lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

fields.name: Belt of Strength
fields.lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

fields.name: Blades of Attack
fields.lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

fields.name: Quarterstaff
fields.lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

fields.name: Force Staff
fields.notes: Quick-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere or Black Hole.
fields.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
fields.description: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to self-cast.

fields.name: Aegis of the Immortal
fields.lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
fields.description: Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 6 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears.

fields.name: Point Booster
fields.lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

fields.name: Flying Courier
fields.description: Fast flying creature that carries items to and from your base. Requires Animal Courier.

fields.name: Town Portal Scroll
fields.description: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building.

fields.name: Claymore
fields.lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

fields.name: Cloak
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with non-item sources of spell resistance.
fields.lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
fields.description: Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.

fields.name: Eye of Skadi
fields.notes: Lasts 5 seconds with melee Eye of Skadi, 3 seconds with ranged Eye of Skadi.
fields.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.
fields.description:
Passive: Cold Attack - Attacks slow the movement and attack speed of the target.

Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. On ranged heroes, Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.

fields.name: Desolator
fields.notes: Armor reduction works on buildings.
fields.lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
fields.description:
Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.

Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

fields.name: Ring of Regen
fields.notes: Ring of Regen is shareable.
fields.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

fields.name: Ring of Protection
fields.lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

fields.name: Battle Fury
fields.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through magic immunity.
fields.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
fields.description: Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 225 AoE around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

fields.name: Divine Rapier
fields.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
fields.description: Drops on death. Divine Rapier is muted to anyone but the owner, as long as he or his teammates pick it up. As soon as an enemy picks it up, Divine Rapier is unmuted, but cannot be dropped except on death.

fields.name: Boots of Travel
fields.notes: Shares cooldown with Town Portal Scrolls.
fields.lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.
fields.description:
Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

fields.name: Delicious Greevil Treat
fields.lore: A strange looking candy, made out of Greevil cream and gummy vitamins.
fields.description: Use: Eat the candy to gain a permanent bonus to your stats, equal to your hero's natural stat gain. Greevil Treats also give 500 XP.

fields.name: Gem of True Sight
fields.notes: Disabled while on a courier.Gives vision in a 1100 radius.
fields.description: Passive: True Sight - Gives the ability to see invisible units and wards. Drops on death, but cannot be destroyed.

fields.name: Mysterious Spell Scroll #4
fields.description: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target unit.

fields.name: Blade Mail
fields.notes: Damage Return is calculated after reductions.Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other Blademails.Won't damage magic immune units.
fields.lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
fields.description: Active: Damage Return - Returns any damage you take to the unit that dealt the damage. Lasts 4.5 seconds.

fields.name: Oblivion Staff
fields.lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

fields.name: Boots of Speed
fields.lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.
fields.description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

fields.name: Vitality Booster
fields.lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

fields.name: Heart of Tarrasque
fields.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
fields.description:
Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second.

This ability is disabled if damage is taken from an enemy Hero or Roshan within the last 4 seconds if your hero is melee or 6 seconds if your hero is ranged.

fields.name: Observer Ward
fields.description:
Use: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area.

Lasts 7 minutes.

fields.name: Mysterious Spell Scroll #3
fields.description: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target enemy unit.

fields.name: Monkey King Bar
fields.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.
fields.description:
Passive: Mini-Bash - Gives a chance to minibash and deal bonus damage.
Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing.

fields.name: Necronomicon
fields.lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
fields.description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you. Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level. Lasts 40 seconds.

fields.name: Stout Shield
fields.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
fields.lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
fields.description: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage, depending on the type of hero you are.

fields.name: Daedalus
fields.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
fields.description: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.

fields.name: Orchid Malevolence
fields.notes: Amplified damage is dealt at the end of the duration as magical damage.
fields.lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
fields.description: Active: Soul Burn - Silences target unit for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30.0%.

fields.name: Cursed Rapier
fields.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
fields.description: Drops on death. Cursed Rapier is muted to anyone but the owner, as long as he or his teammates pick it up. As soon as an enemy picks it up, Cursed Rapier is unmuted, but cannot be dropped except on death. Cursed Rapier gives vision of its bearer to all enemy heroes Each time Cursed Rapier gets a kill for its owner, it loses 100 damage.

fields.name: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
fields.notes: You cannot cyclone allies.
fields.lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
fields.description:
Active: Cyclone - Target unit is swept up in a cyclone for 2.5 seconds, and is invulnerable.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple Eul's Scepters do not stack.

fields.name: Mysterious Spell Scroll #1
fields.description: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target point.

fields.name: Satanic
fields.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.
fields.description:
Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal by 175% for 3.5 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives Lifesteal on attacks.

Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.

fields.name: Skull Basher
fields.notes: Doesn't stack with other sources of bash.
fields.lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
fields.description: Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.

fields.name: Eaglesong
fields.lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

fields.name: Manta Style
fields.notes: Has a 0.1 second cast time upon which you are invulnerable.Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
fields.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
fields.description:
Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 illusions of your hero that last 20 seconds.

Melee illusions deal 33% damage and take 250% bonus damage. Ranged illusions deal 28% damage and take 300% bonus damage.

Percentage based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

fields.name: Tranquil Boots
fields.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
fields.description:
Active: Heal - Restores 250 HP over 20 seconds while out of combat.
Passive: Break - Tranquil Boots lose their bonuses and only provide 25 MS until the last 10 seconds don't have 3 instances of damage.

fields.name: Helm of Iron Will
fields.lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

fields.name: Yasha
fields.lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
fields.description: Percentage based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

fields.name: Cheese
fields.notes: Cheese is shareable.
fields.lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
fields.description: Use: Instantly restores health and mana.

fields.name: Abyssal Blade
fields.notes: The stun is melee range.Doesn't stack with other bashes.
fields.lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
fields.description: Active: Stun a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Goes through Magic Immunity. Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.

fields.name: Headdress
fields.lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
fields.description:
Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores HP to allies in a 750 unit radius.

Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.

fields.name: Ghost Scepter
fields.notes: Ends if you become magic immune, and will have no effect if you are already magic immune.Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
fields.lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
fields.description: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form, unable to attack or be attacked, but take -40% extra magic damage. Using a Teleport Scroll or Boots of Travel dispels Ghost Form.

fields.name: Helm of the Dominator
fields.notes: Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
fields.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
fields.description:
Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit.
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.

Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

fields.name: Drum of Endurance
fields.lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.
fields.description:
Active: Endurance - Gives bonus +10 attack and +10% movement speed to surrounding allies.
Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus attack and movement speed to surrounding allies.

Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.

fields.name: Urn of Shadows
fields.lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
fields.description:
Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
Active: Soul Release - Heals HP over time for friendly units, but deals damage over time for enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.

fields.name: Magic Wand
fields.notes: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
fields.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
fields.description: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 15) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area. When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.

fields.name: Medallion of Courage
fields.lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.
fields.description: Active: Valor - Reduces the armor of you and your target. Lasts 7 seconds.

fields.name: Magic Stick
fields.notes: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
fields.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
fields.description: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area. When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.

fields.name: Orb of Venom
fields.lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
fields.description:
Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing, depending on whether your hero is melee or ranged.

Orb of Venom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

fields.name: Mysterious Spell Scroll #5
fields.description: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target point.

fields.name: Hood of Defiance
fields.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with non-item sources of spell resistance.
fields.lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.
fields.description: Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.

fields.name: Mjollnir
fields.notes: Static Charge cannot trigger more than one per second.Static Charge's lightning deals 200 magical damage, the damage source and secondary targets cannot be more than 900 range away, the 3 targets hit must be in a cone with 125 starting radius, 475 distance and 300 final radius.
fields.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
fields.description:
Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance to release Chain Lighting on attack, dealing damage to multiple targets.

Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

fields.name: Iron Branch
fields.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

fields.name: Armlet of Mordiggian
fields.notes: Activation has a 2 second cooldown.The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
fields.lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
fields.description: Active: Unholy Strength - Gives +31 damage, +10 attack speed, and +25 strength while active, but drains 40 HP per second. You cannot die from the health loss when the bonus strength is gone, or the health drain per second.

fields.name: Maelstrom
fields.lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
fields.description:
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 4 targets, dealing damage.

Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

fields.name: Power Treads
fields.lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
fields.description:
Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

fields.name: Hand of Midas
fields.notes: The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
fields.lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
fields.description: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience. Cannot be used on Ancients.

fields.name: Mysterious Spell Scroll #2
fields.description: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target point.

fields.name: Blink Dagger
fields.notes: Quick-casting will cause you to teleport towards your fountain.
fields.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
fields.description: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken from an enemy hero, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.

fields.name: Javelin
fields.lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
fields.description: Passive: Pierce - Grants a chance to deal bonus damage.

fields.name: Bracer
fields.lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

fields.name: Perseverance
fields.notes: Perseverance is shareable.
fields.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

fields.name: Smoke of Deceit
fields.description: Use: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisiblity and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Upon moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, the invisibility is lost.

fields.name: Morbid Mask
fields.lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
fields.description:
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.

Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

fields.name: Shadow Blade
fields.notes: Has a 0.3 second fade time.If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
fields.lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
fields.description: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to break the invisibility, you gain 150 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 12 seconds.

fields.name: Mask of Madness
fields.lore: Once this mask is worn, it's bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
fields.description:
Active: Berserk - Gives 100 attack speed and 30% movement speed but causes you to take extra 30% damage. Lasts 12 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Grants lifesteal on attacks.

Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

fields.name: Quelling Blade
fields.notes: Cannot carry more than one.
fields.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
fields.description:
Active: Destroy Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree, or deals 100 damage to a ward.
Passive: Quell - Gives bonus attack damage against non-hero units, depending on the type of hero you are.

fields.name: Arcane Boots
fields.notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
fields.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
fields.description:
Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana in an area around the hero.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

fields.name: Soul Booster
fields.lore: Regain lost courage.

fields.name: Soul Ring
fields.notes: If the mana gain cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that is used before your mana pool.  If this mana is not used before the duration, the extra mana is lost.
fields.lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those around it.
fields.description: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 HP to temporarily gain 150 Mana. Lasts 10 seconds.

fields.name: Animal Courier
fields.lore: Losing the donkey is punishable by death.
fields.description: Creature that carries items to and from your base.

fields.name: Gauntlets of Strength
fields.lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

fields.name: Heaven's Halberd
fields.notes: The disarm effect cannot be purged.
fields.lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
fields.description:
Active: Disarms the target for 4.5 seconds. Lasts 3.0 on Melee targets.
Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.

fields.name: Sentry Ward
fields.description:
Use: Places a Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area.

Lasts 4 minutes.

fields.name: Sange and Yasha
fields.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.
fields.description:
Passive: Greater Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.

Percentage based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

fields.name: Veil of Discord
fields.lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.
fields.description: Active: Magic Weakness - Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 25.0 seconds.

fields.name: Robe of the Magi
fields.lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

fields.name: Necronomicon
fields.lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
fields.description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you. Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level. Lasts 40 seconds.

fields.name: Necronomicon
fields.lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
fields.description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you. Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level. Lasts 40 seconds.

fields.name: Ethereal Blade
fields.notes: Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
fields.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
fields.description: Active: Ether Blast - Converts you and your target into ethereal form. Target unit is slowed and cannot attack or be attacked, and takes 2.0x of your primary attribute + 75 as damage.

fields.name: Shiva's Guard
fields.notes: The wave extends at a speed of 300 to a max size of 719.The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
fields.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
fields.description:
Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that does 200 damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.
Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces attack speed on enemies.

Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.

fields.name: Energy Booster
fields.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

fields.name: Poor Man's Shield
fields.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
fields.lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
fields.description: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage, depending on the type of hero you are. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a chance to block damage from creeps.

fields.name: Diffusal Blade
fields.notes: Instantly kills summoned units.Slow lasts 4 seconds.
fields.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
fields.description:
Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.
Passive: Feedback - Your attacks burn 20/36 mana and deal the same amount in physical damage. Upgradable.

Diffusal Blade is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

fields.name: Vanguard
fields.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
fields.lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.
fields.description: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage, depending on the type of hero you are.

fields.name: Ring of Basilius
fields.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
fields.lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
fields.description:
Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.

fields.name: Ring of Aquila
fields.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
fields.lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.
fields.description:
Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.

fields.name: Radiance
fields.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.
fields.description:
Active: Toggles Burn Damage on or off.
Passive: Burn Damage - Deals damage per second in a 700 radius.

fields.name: Scythe of Vyse
fields.notes: Instantly destroys illusions.The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.Hex disables damage block and evasion.
fields.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
fields.description: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Destroys illusions.

fields.name: Linken's Sphere
fields.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
fields.description: Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 17 seconds.

fields.name: Void Stone
fields.notes: Void Stone is shareable.
fields.lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

fields.name: Bloodstone
fields.notes: Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
fields.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
fields.description:
Active: Pocket Suicide - Instantly commits suicide.

Passive: Bloodpact - Starts with 8 charges. Gains 1 charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge bestows 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. When the bearer dies, restores 400 HP + 30 HP per charge to allied units within 1675 units, then loses a third of its charges. While dead, the bearer continues to receive experience at the death location and gives 1800 unit vision there.

fields.name: Rod of Atos
fields.lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.
fields.description: Active: Cripple - Slows the target's movement speed.

fields.name: Hyperstone
fields.lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

fields.name: Buckler
fields.lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
fields.description: Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 to all nearby allied units. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

fields.name: Wraith Band
fields.lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

fields.name: Sage's Mask
fields.notes: Sage's Mask is shareable.
fields.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

fields.name: Pipe of Insight
fields.notes: Does not affect units that have been affected by Barrier in the last 50 seconds.Stacks multiplicatively with non-item sources of spell resistance.
fields.lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
fields.description:
Active: Barrier - Gives nearby friendly units a shield that blocks 400 spell damage.

Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.

fields.name: Phase Boots
fields.lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
fields.description:
Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

fields.name: Crystalys
fields.lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
fields.description: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.

fields.name: Band of Elvenskin
fields.lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

fields.name: Butterfly
fields.notes: Doesn't stack with other sources of Evasion.
fields.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

fields.name: Ring of Health
fields.notes: Ring of Health is shareable.
fields.lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

fields.name: Assault Cuirass
fields.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Assault Cuirass, Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
fields.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
fields.description:
Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases armor for nearby enemies.

Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.

fields.name: Null Talisman
fields.lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

fields.name: Vladmir's Offering
fields.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
fields.lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
fields.description:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants a variety of bonuses to nearby allies. Lifesteal bonuses from Vladmir's Aura only affect melee units.

Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.

fields.name: Black King Bar
fields.notes: Cannot be sold.Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
fields.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
fields.description: Active: Avatar - Grants magic immunity. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some Ultimate abilities are able to disable through Black King Bar.

fields.name: Bottle
fields.notes: Bottle is shareable.
fields.lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
fields.description: Use: Regenerate - Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain. You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use. After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated. If Bottle is empty, it causes a courier to move 30% slower.

fields.name: Dust of Appearance
fields.notes: Places a buff on enemy units in the area that prevents them from becoming invisible.
fields.description: Use: Reveal - Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

fields.name: Aghanim's Scepter
fields.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.
fields.description: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimates of certain heroes.

fields.name: Mekansm
fields.notes: Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
fields.lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
fields.description:
Active: Restore - Heals 250 HP and gives +2 armor in an area.
Passive: Mekansm Aura - Bonus HP Regen in an area.

Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
